text: The Snartemo Sword is a sword that was found in a Norwegian grave, dated to the early 6th century. It was found in the autumn of 1933. ==Sources== *Solveig Möllenberg: Tradition und Transfer in spätgermanischer Zeit, P. 88 ==References== ==Other websites== *The ancient sword Snartemosverdet is part of the findings from the farm Snartemo in Southern Norway. (Updated 2021) Category:Swords Category:6th-century works
title: Snartemo Sword
